question-197.sql:
CREATE TABLE DVDNormal
(dvdId int not null,
dvdTitle varchar(255),
year varchar(255),
publicRating decimal(4,2),
dvdStudioId int,
dvdStatusId int,
dvdGenreId int);

question-199.sql:
ALTER TABLE DVDNormal
ADD FOREIGN KEY (dvdStudioId) REFERENCES dvdStudio (studioId)
ON UPDATE CASCADE
ON DELETE CASCADE;

ALTER TABLE DVDNormal
ADD FOREIGN KEY (dvdStatusId) REFERENCES dvdStatus (statusId)
ON UPDATE CASCADE
ON DELETE CASCADE;

ALTER TABLE DVDNormal
ADD FOREIGN KEY (dvdGenreId) REFERENCES dvdGenre (genreId)
ON UPDATE CASCADE
ON DELETE CASCADE;

question-201.sql:
CREATE INDEX idxDvd
ON dvd (Studio, Status, Genre);

question-202.sql:
insert into DVDNormal (dvdId, dvdTitle, year, publicRating, dvdStudioId, dvdStatusId, dvdGenreId)
(select dvdId, dvd_title, year, publicRating, dvdStudio.StudioId, dvdStatus.StatusId, dvdGenre.genreId from dvd
JOIN dvdStudio on dvdStudio.studioName = dvd.Studio
JOIN dvdStatus on dvdStatus.statusName = dvd.Status
JOIN dvdGenre on dvdGenre.genreName = dvd.Genre);
